subject: Re-Activation of OEM Windows XP Home Edition
body:
Somebody figured it out -- we have 35 million laws trying to enforce Ten Commandments.

Behind every argument is someone's ignorance.

Wine is a treacherous friend who you must always be on guard for.

Knowledge like timber shouldn't be mush use till they are seasoned.

The winning team has a dedication. It will have a core of veteran players who set the standards. They will not accept defeat.

Weep not that the world changes -- did it keep a stable, changeless state, it were cause indeed to weep.

It's no use saying, ''We are doing our best.'' You have got to succeed in doing what is necessary.

What helps people, helps business.

More firm and sure the hand of courage strikes, when it obeys the watchful eye of caution.

I'm very brave generally, he went on in a low voice: only today I happen to have a headache.

A sedentary life is the real sin against the Holy Spirit. Only those thoughts that come by walking have any value.

Without winners, there wouldn't even be any civilization.

Never open the door to a lesser evil, for other ones invariably slink in after it.
